attributes.action: Consider SEN students as vulnerable to coronavirus. Close All SEN schools
attributes.additional_details: I am a staff member at a SEN school who works with autistic (high and low functioning) and profound multiple learning difficulties. A lot of the children use their mouths as a form of sensory exploration/ processing. This could cause mass spread of the virus. We are concerned for the families of both pupils and staff.
attributes.background: Consider staff and vulnerable children in schools, close schools for a period of time to protect and prevent spread for the most vulnerable.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the closure of schools and colleges: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
